entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stepper allows the value to increment past max when min, max, value set to 1. #28330
  • Bump CommunityToolkit/SF on IncludeSampleContent template #28324
    .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Setting the background property of Picker/Spinner in a handler mapping does not work for .net 8 #28317
  • Hot Reload and Live Preview won't work if the configuration is not called Debug #28316
  • [Windows] WebView Navigated event is still called even after cancelling the Navigation #28303
  • Delay in Hiding Custom Busy Indicator Animation During Page Navigation in .NET MAUI. #28300
  • [iOS, Border] Border with a inner image doesn't animate right #28296

Closed

  • CollectionView inside invisible StackLayout doesn't show on iOS #28263
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #7156
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Using Maui controls and layout in blazor #28252
  • CarouselView content calls SizeChanged forever with certain parent view/display resolution combinations #22363
    Backlog
  • "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property, and doesn't display a preview in the XAML editor #21325
    Backlog
  • [testing] Run Android device tests on Windows #25570
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Catalyst Device Tests are broken from [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28285
    .NET 9 SR5
  • The fonts are italic when uninstall the app with installshield #28295
  • When creating a new project, it always gets stuck displaying the message: "Xcode: Checking the environment." #28299
  • Today, we are excited to announce the first preview release of .NET 10! We just shipped our **first** preview release, adding to some major enhancements across the .NET Runtime, SDK, libraries, C#, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, .NET MAUI, and more. Check out the full release notes linked below and get started today. #28297
  • Scrollview with ScrollView VerticalOptions="Center" not growing to fit contents on iOS #23084
  • MAUI Swipe view items looks weird on iOS #21329

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Fix platform for UItests for iOS #28328
    area-testing, testing-green-ci, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Obsolete TableView #28327
  • [ci] Fix provisionator #28325
  • What if we did not use dictionaries? #28322
  • [Android] CV RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand fires on initial data load - fix #28321
    community ✨
  • Fix for Shell does not always raise Navigating event on Windows #28315
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28312
  • [Windows] Fixed Horizontal Spacing for Horizontal List #28311
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [XC] add IRootObjectProvider #28310
  • Fix ImageButton not rendering correctly based on its bounds #28309
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Align the Sender between the gestures when emit the events #28305
    area-gestures
  • Obsolete TableView #28302
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-listview, .NET 10.0-preview2

Merged

  • Fix/workaround iOS stuck device tests #28196
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Update Versions.props to .NET 9 SR6 #28326
  • Mark MapReload from PickerHandler Obsolete #28028
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [HybridWebView] Always complete web requests #28313
  • [net10.0] Update net10.0 preview3 #28228
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Remove mobile librarybuilder net9 #28290
    area-infrastructure, dependencies, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Update Versions.props for .NET 9 SR5 Servicing #28320
  • Disable test recently re-enabled BindingUpdatesFromInteractiveRefresh #28314
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [HybridWebView] Always complete web requests #28286
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 5 #28269
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Update sdk and runtime #28307
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Make HybridWebViewHandler throw JS exceptions in C# by default #28086
    .NET 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • Make DisplayAlert & DisplayActionSheet more consistent by adding Async #28053
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] Fix Numeric Entry not accepting the appropriate Decimal Separator #27376
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix the FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync() Not Returning Null When Canceled #27961
    area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Enable trimmer warnings #28015
    t/app-size, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [iOS & Android] Fix: RadioButton Focused and Unfocused Events Not Firing. #28164
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Remove PlatformWrapperView.java setHasShadow #28245
    t/breaking 💥, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: GestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment does not update at run time #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 2 #28058
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for FlyoutItem in overflow menu not fully interactable #27575
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Header and Footer-Name textbox is cut off in collection view #26947
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix the ListView scroll position center and end without animation #27001
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the SwipeView items were not displayed properly #27399
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView throws NRE when value of IsGrouped property is changed to false #27331
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Picker Items are not Displaying on macOS platform #27535
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed Button rendering overflow in StackLayout #28001
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    area-core-hosting
  • Fix for Item should scrolled based on the GroupHeaderTemplate #28074
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [.Net10] Make IsVisibleCore and RefreshIsVisibleProperty visible #28139
    t/breaking 💥, area-architecture, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed FlyoutMenu icon issue when clearing and adding items #28241
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Shapes BackgroundColor invalidation #27398
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Add Appium capabilities to speed up tests #27371
    area-testing
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, stale
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-gestures
  • Fix for border color of the RadioButton is visible in Windows #28214
    community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 5 #28193
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows]Fix NullReferenceException in OpenReadAsync for FileResult created with full path #28238
    platform/windows 🪟, area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix for Label Not Vertically Centered with MinimumHeightRequest #28270
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Trimming] Make it possible to trim controls and handlers #28115
    t/app-size
  • Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android (#28116) #28284
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • [Windows] Fix Indicator View Causing Looping Issue with CarouselView #27880
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for the FontImageSource color is not applied properly to the Tab Icon #26757
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Fixed flickering when navigating using GoToAsync #28159
    area-navigation, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
